title: Little Library
details: Little_libraries_client is build with React using a Postgres/Node/Express backend, with the Google Maps API and Firebase Cloud Storage for keeping track of ‘Little Libraries’
author: Kaoru & Jeff
stack: React.js, Express, PostgreSQL, react-google-maps, react-dom, JWTs, bcryptjs, axios

title: Find Meow!
details: Find Me-ow! is an app with React using a Postgres/Node/Express backend, with the Google Maps API and Twilio to help to unite lost cats and found cats with their owners.
author: Kaoru, Mei & Walid
stack: React.js, Express, PostgreSQL, react-google-maps, react-dom, bcryptjs, axios

title: Scheduler
details: Interview Scheduler is a one page application built with React using Jest, Storybook, and Cypress for arranging interview schedules.
author: Kaoru

title: Tweeter
details: Tweeter is a simple, single-page Twitter clone. Single Page App (SPA) built with HTML, CSS, JS, jQuery and AJAX Resources.
author: Kaoru
stack: HTML, CSS, JS, jQuery and AJAX
